title: roadrunner-amqp
description: The schema contains all the valid configuration parameters for the AMQP plugin for the roadrunner job system.

name.description: The name of the exchange (version 2 nested key).

type.description: The type of exchange (version 2 nested key).

durable.description: Whether the exchange is durable (version 2 nested key). See https://www.rabbitmq.com/tutorials/amqp-concepts.html#exchanges

auto_delete.description: Whether to auto-delete the exchange when the last queue is unbound from it (version 2 nested key). See https://www.rabbitmq.com/tutorials/amqp-concepts.html#exchanges

declare.description: Whether to declare the exchange at startup (version 2 nested key).

routing_key.description: Routing key for the queue (version 2 nested key).

durable.description: Whether the queue is durable (version 2 nested key).

auto_delete.description: Whether to auto-delete queues that have had at least one consumer when the last consumer unsubscribes (version 2 nested key).

exclusive.description: Declare a queue exclusive at the exchange (version 2 nested key).

consumer_id.description: The unique identifier for the consumer amongst all consumers on this channel (version 2).

delete_on_stop.description: Whether to delete the queue when stopping the pipeline (version 2).

multiple_ack.description: When multiple ACK is enabled, this delivery and all prior unacknowledged deliveries on the same channel will be acknowledged. This is useful for batch processing of deliveries (version 2).

requeue_on_fail.description: Whether to use RabbitMQ mechanisms to requeue the job on failure (version 2).

declare.description: Whether to declare and bind the queue at startup (version 2 nested key).

configV2.description: Dedicated AMQP version 2 pipeline configuration shape (nested exchange/queue options).

redial_timeout.description: Redial timeout (in seconds). How long to try to reconnect to the AMQP server. Default or zero means 60.

config.description: Configuration options for the AMQP pipeline. For a strict version 2-only shape see `#/definitions/configV2`.

version.description: AMQP pipeline config format version. Use 0/1 (or omit) for legacy flat options, use 2 for nested entity options (`exchange.*` and `queue.*`).

delete_queue_on_stop.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Whether to delete the queue when stopping the pipeline.

queue.description: The queue name (legacy, version 1) or queue options object (version 2). In version 2, use the object form and treat legacy flat queue keys as ignored.

exchange.description: The exchange name (legacy, version 1) or exchange options object (version 2). In version 2, use the object form and treat legacy flat exchange keys as ignored.

redial_timeout.description: Redial timeout (in seconds). How long to try to reconnect to the AMQP server. Default or zero means 60.

exchange_durable.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Whether the exchange is durable. See https://www.rabbitmq.com/tutorials/amqp-concepts.html#exchanges

durable.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Whether the queue is durable.

consumer_id.description: The unique identifier for the consumer amongst all consumers on this channel (legacy version 1 flat key).

exchange_auto_delete.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Whether to auto-delete the exchange when the last queue is unbound from it. See https://www.rabbitmq.com/tutorials/amqp-concepts.html#exchanges

queue_auto_delete.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Whether to auto-delete queues that have had at least one consumer when the last consumer unsubscribes.

exchange_type.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. The type of exchange.

routing_key.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Routing key for the queue.

exclusive.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Declare a queue exclusive at the exchange.

multiple_ack.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. When multiple ACK is enabled, this delivery and all prior unacknowledged deliveries on the same channel will be acknowledged. This is useful for batch processing of deliveries.

requeue_on_fail.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Whether to use RabbitMQ mechanisms to requeue the job on failure.

queue_headers.description: Legacy version 1 flat key. Queue declare args.

driver.description: Configuration options for the AMQP driver.

addr.title: AMQP Server URI
addr.description: AMQP URI to connect to the rabbitmq server. See https://www.rabbitmq.com/uri-spec.html
